overview: The year is 1943. During the decline of the second world war, the German's discover a marooned spaceship capable of time travel, thus enabling them to alter the outcome of their fate. Enter Erna Kurtz, a newly hired spy that stumbles upon the Nazi's plot. With the help of her fearless friend Janet, Erna must face her past in order to secure her future.
tagline: Time is not on your side.
title: Urda: The Third Reich
